value.title: Running totals in power query??? Yes, you can :)

Also, I will show you how List.Range work, really cool function :)  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Schedule data downloads / exports in Power BI
value.excerpt: You can export data or download data out of Power BI in many different ways and depending on the source, you can schedule refresh those data dumps too. value.title: Exploring the Visio visual in Power BI
